channel.title: Dharok Armor Effect [317]
channel.description: Well, I was looking around for some help, but everything I found on Dharok armor effect just made the set hit 990's everytime. I need it to make it hit higher the lower your HP goes. Anyone know a solution?

item.title: Dharok Armor Effect [317]
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:2, topic:553361”]If you want to be spoon fed you’ll need to tell us which base your using.

With simple math on our side, we can use a formula such as this:

int getDharokBonusDamage() { return Math.ceil(maxHP/HP); }

Of course this is just an example and is not the real RS formula. A simple wiki search would provide you with that.[/quote]

Well, I’m using '[PI] base if thats any help.

Read full topic

item.title: Dharok Armor Effect [317]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

If you want to be spoon fed you’ll need to tell us which base your using.

With simple math on our side, we can use a formula such as this:

int getDharokBonusDamage() { return Math.ceil(maxHP/HP); }

Of course this is just an example and is not the real RS formula. A simple wiki search would provide you with that.

Read full topic
